医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
发现低分子量人白细胞介素 1β 拮抗剂研究人员描述了一种低分子量的人白细胞介素 1β 拮抗剂的检测，该拮抗剂会破坏与白细胞介素 1 受体 I 型受体的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Low-molecular-weight- human-interleukin-1ceb2-antagonist-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Low-molecular-weight- human-interleukin-1ceb2-antagonist-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35406ace-5abb-40a7-a3e3-83cecab42d9f Mon, 11 Sep 2023 11:44:00 -0400 Low-molecular weight human interleukin-1β antagonist discovered
乳化剂与心脏健康：一项前瞻性队列研究揭示了相关性在 BMJ 最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员研究了食物乳化剂的摄入量与心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Emulsifiers-and-heart-health-a-prospective-cohort-study-reveals-associations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Emulsifiers-and-heart-health-a-prospective-cohort-study-reveals-associations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eae8ff89-2140-437d-9235-90412b5f9237 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 11:31:00 -0400 Emulsifiers and heart health: a prospective cohort study reveals associations
工作场所掩蔽：洞察社会适应的隐藏现实研究人员检查了神经正常、自闭症和神经分歧的非自闭症成年人的工作场所掩蔽经历。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Workplace-masking-insights-into-the-hidden-realities-of-social-adaptation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Workplace-masking-insights-into-the-hidden-realities-of-social-adaptation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e77f7cc-e726-4447-908e-953ad90854ab Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:58:00 -0400 Workplace masking: insights into the hidden realities of social adaptation
改良的腺癌分类提高了可重复性并符合临床实际根据在新加坡举行的国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会上公布的研究结果，修改后的腺癌分类方法可显着提高可重复性，并且可能是对现有世界卫生组织分类系统的改进。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Modified-adenocarcinoma-classification-improves-reproducibility-and-aligns-with-clinical-reality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Modified-adenocarcinoma-classification-improves-reproducibility-and-aligns-with-clinical-reality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca71eddb-746d-49c9-8c50-965a0509576d Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:44:54 -0400 Modified adenocarcinoma classification improves reproducibility and aligns with clinical reality
药用大麻及其对患者报告的慢性健康结果的影响研究人员评估了服用药用大麻的患者与健康相关的生活质量和其他结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Medicinal-cannabis-and-its-impact-on-病人-reported-outcomes-in-chronic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Medicinal-cannabis-and-its-impact-on-病人-reported-outcomes-in-chronic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6639f95d-2774-42c4-8055-fc27be84e883 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:44:00 -0400 Medicinal cannabis and its impact on patient-reported outcomes in chronic health
奥希替尼联合化疗在晚期 EGFR 突变 NSCLC 中显示出显着的 PFS 益处今天在新加坡举行的国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会上发表的研究显示，与单用奥希替尼相比，奥希替尼联合化疗具有统计学上显着且具有临床意义的无进展生存获益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Osimertinib-plus-chemotherapy-shows-significant-PFS-benefit-in-advanced-EGFR-mutated-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Osimertinib-plus-chemotherapy-shows-significant-PFS-benefit-in-advanced-EGFR-mutated-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf33f204-07ed-4e24-b853-fc66701417d7 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:35:52 -0400 Osimertinib plus chemotherapy shows significant PFS benefit in advanced EGFR-mutated NSCLC
扩大胸膜切除术加化疗与间皮瘤患者的预后较差相关根据今天向国际肺癌研究协会提交的研究，与单独使用铂类药物和培美曲塞化疗相比，扩大胸膜切除术联合化疗会导致更差的生存结果、更高的严重不良事件发生率以及生活质量下降。 IASLC）2023 年世界肺癌大会在新加坡举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Extended-pleurection-decortication-plus-chemotherapy-linked-with-worse-outcomes-for-mesothelioma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Extended-pleurection-decortication-plus-chemotherapy-linked-with-worse-outcomes-for-mesothelioma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f24648c-f077-4029-aef5-ab908d8387d2 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:26:58 -0400 Extended pleurectomy decortication plus chemotherapy associated with worse outcomes for mesothelioma patients
Durvalumab 在可切除 NSCLC 患者中显示出可耐受的手术安全性根据今天在国际肺癌研究协会 2023 年世界会议上公布的 3 期 AEGEAN 试验的研究结果，在新辅助化疗中添加杜瓦鲁单抗不会对可切除 NSCLC 患者的手术产生不利影响，并且与可耐受的手术安全性相关。新加坡的肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Durvalumab-shows-tolerable-surgical-safety-profile-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Durvalumab-shows-tolerable-surgical-safety-profile-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b31ee87-10af-47a9-ad3e-01928f984136 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:23:46 -0400 Durvalumab shows tolerable surgical safety profile in patients with resectable NSCLC
台湾国家肺癌早期检测计划通过早期诊断为挽救生命带来希望台湾国家肺癌早期检测计划在0期或1期水平检测出85%的肺癌病例，这表明肺癌筛查可以在足够早的阶段发现肺癌，以便医生更有效地干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Taiwan-National-Lung-Cancer-Early-Detection-Program-offers-hope-for- saving-lives-through-early-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Taiwan-National-Lung-Cancer-Early-Detection-Program-offers-hope-for- saving-lives-through-early-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d73778fd-016d-4815-a957-992725f89e58 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 10:18:47 -0400 Taiwan National Lung Cancer Early Detection Program offers hope for saving lives through early diagnosis
研究旨在确定干预措施，以消除与肺癌和吸烟相关的呼吸道疾病相关的耻辱感根据今天在国际肺癌研究协会上发表的研究，肺癌患者在被诊断出肺癌时面临的耻辱与较差的心理社会结果有关，包括痛苦和孤立、延迟寻求帮助以及对护理质量的担忧(IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会在新加坡举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-aims-to-identify-interventions-to-combat-stigma-linked-with-lung-cancer-and-smoking-lated-respiratory-diseases。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-aims-to-identify-interventions-to-combat-stigma-linked-with-lung-cancer-and-smoking-lated-respiratory-diseases。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59f6adb9-4cef-46a7-a4d4-85daef477403 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:43:13 -0400 Study aims to identify interventions to combat stigma associated with lung cancer and smoking-related respiratory diseases
